document_data.caption: The inn is known for its rowdy clientele.
document_data.name: Gilded Horseshoe
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gilded Horseshoe''' was an [[inn]] located in the town of [[Longsaddle]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location:
[[File:Longsaddle interactive atlas.png|thumb|300px|A map showing the Gilded Horseshoe in the center of Longsaddle.]]
The Gilded Horseshoe sat near the middle of the town south of an open market and the [[Saddle Pond]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4400 Longsaddle}}
